content: उदास् {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> [उद्-आस्] To be indifferent or unconcerned, be careless or apathetic; to be passive or inactive; तत्किमित्युदासते भरताः <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; विधाय वैरं सामर्षे नरोऽरौ य उदासते <ls>Śi. 2. 42</ls>; <ls>Bg. 9. 9</ls>; Sān. <ls>K. 20</ls>; not to share in, show no interest in; <ls>Mu. 1.</ls>
